string.name: full_description_text
string.context: Full description text of the app in the Google Play page of the app

resources.string: Mega est un hébergeur en ligne sécurisé qui vous met gratuitement à disposition 50Go. Contrairement aux autres hébergeurs en ligne, vos données sont uniquement chiffrées et déchiffrées par les appareils du client et jamais par nous.Vos données sont accessibles quand vous voulez, à partir de n\'importe quel appareil, et où vous voulez. Partagez des dossiers entiers avec vos contacts et voyez leurs apports en temps réel.Le cloud dans votre poche. Accéder et diffuser vos fichiers depuis votre téléphone ou votre tablette. Envoyer et synchroniser vos médias dans le cloud.Cherchez, stockez, diffusez, visionnez, partagez, renommez ou supprimez vos fichiers. Tout est là, dans la paume de votre main.Pour plus d\'information, veuillez vous rendre sur notre site Internet : https://mega.nz/

string.name: short_description_text
string.context: Short description text of the app in the Google Play page of the app

resources.string: MEGA est un Service de Cloud Avec une Confidentialité Puissante et Toujours Active. 50Go gratuit

string.name: general_total_size
string.context: label for the total file size of multiple files and/or folders (no need to put the colon punctuation in the translation)

string.name: general_x_of_x
string.context: Showing progress of elements. Example: 2 of 10.

string.name: general_yes
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_no
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_cancel
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_move_to
string.context: When moving a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_copy_to
string.context: When copying a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_import_to
string.context: When importing a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_select
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_select_to_upload
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_select_to_download
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_create
string.context: This is the final button when creating a folder in the dialog where the user inserts the folder name

string.name: general_upload
string.context: Button text when uploading a file to a previously selected location in MEGA

string.name: general_download
string.context: Item menu option upon right click on one or multiple files.

string.name: general_empty
string.context: Button to delete the contents of the trashbin. Can also be translated as "clear"

string.name: general_loading
string.context: state previous to import a file

string.name: general_importing
string.context: state while importing the file

string.name: general_import
string.context: Import button. When the user clicks this button the file will be imported to his account.

string.name: general_storage
string.context: Text listed before the amount of storage a user gets with a certain package. For example: "1TB Storage".

string.name: general_bandwidth
string.context: Text listed before the amount of bandwidth a user gets with a certain package. For example: "8TB Bandwidth". Can also be translated as data transfer.

string.name: general_subscribe
string.context: Text placed inside the button the user clicks when upgrading to PRO. Meaning: subscribe to this plan

string.name: general_continue
string.context: Text placed inside the button the user clicks when clicking into the FREE account. Meaning: Continue to the main screen

string.name: general_error_word
string.context: It will be followed by the error message

string.name: general_error_file_not_found
string.context: Message shown when a file doesn't exist

string.name: general_error_folder_not_found
string.context: Message shown when a folder doesn't exist

string.name: general_not_yet_implemented
string.context: when clicking into a menu whose functionality is not yet implemented

string.name: error_no_selection
string.context: when any file or folder is selected

string.name: general_already_downloaded
string.context: when trying to download a file that is already downloaded in the device

string.name: general_already_uploaded
string.context: when trying to upload a file that is already uploaded in the folder

string.name: general_file_info
string.context: Label of the option menu. When clicking this button, the app shows the info of the file

string.name: general_folder_info
string.context: Label of the option menu. When clicking this button, the app shows the info of the folder

string.name: general_menu
string.context: Title when the left menu is opened

string.context: Local folder error in Sync Service. There are two syncs for images and videos. This error appears when the secondary media local folder doesn't exist

string.name: section_cloud_drive
string.context: The name of every users root drive in the cloud of MEGA. The term \'cloud\' is a new computer term and can probably not be translated. Do not translate "cloud" literal unless your language allows this. Please see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloud_computing for your reference.

string.name: settings_secondary_upload_on
string.context: The Secondary Media Uploads allows to create a second Camera Folder synchronization. Enabling it would imply to choose a new local folder and then, a new destination folder in MEGA. This is the text that appears in the settings option to enable the second synchronization.

string.name: settings_secondary_upload_off
string.context: The Secondary Media Uploads allows to create a second Camera Folder synchronization. Disabling it would imply that the current second sync won't be running anymore. This is the text that appears in the settings option to disable the second synchronization.

resources.string: L\'opération ne s\'est pas terminée correctement. La carte de crédit ne sera pas facturée.

string.name: credit_card_information_error
string.context: Message shown when the credit card information is not correct

resources.string: Les informations de la carte de crédit n\'est pas correcte. La carte de crédit ne sera pas facturée.

string.name: not_upgrade_is_possible
string.context: Message shown when the user wants to upgrade an account that cannot be upgraded

resources.string: Votre compte ne peut pas être mis-à-jour depuis l\'application. Veuillez contacter support@mega.nz pour mettre votre compte à niveau.
